name: THE MIDDLE
description:
''THE MIDDLE''

Acrylic on paper.
2/3

Second painting, in a series of 3, about the perception of processes.

THE MIDDLE

The middle of the road is turbulent, but it's important to continue.
To live in the middle of a process is almost to be able to see it fully, but not yet.
 
To live in the middle is to live immersed in it, without being able, yet, to see the end.

by

ZALA
2021
